node.display_long_description:
“ForeVR Bowl 是有史以来最好玩的保龄球游戏”— 游戏设计师的母亲 Vicki P

游戏之夜惊喜回归，带您体验前所未有的乐趣！从超过 6 个球馆（90年代馆、月球、图腾岛 等等！）中选择您心仪的球馆，即可和自己的朋友、家人一同在 VR 中体验独一无二的游戏乐趣。您可以选择单人游戏模式，或者邀请其他玩家一同体验令人沉浸的游戏场景，享受别具一格的配乐以及复活节趣味彩蛋带来的惊喜。参加休闲对战或者排行赛，解锁超过 100 款可收集的保龄球，体验它们各具特色的投掷风格和独有的特技。

ForeVR Bowl 作为一款极其出色的保龄球模拟游戏，采用尖端的游戏引擎和真实的物理系统，为您创造出本地保龄球馆拥有的一切条件……而且无需租用发臭的保龄球鞋。

无论您是想与三两好友一起打球娱乐，还是想体验排行赛角逐，亦或是体验月球漫步的乐趣，来玩 ForeVR Bowl 吧。这款世界上最好玩的保龄球模拟游戏定能满足您的需求。

开始游戏！

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
*** HOT FIX ***
Fixed mic permission decline bug at app start

WHAT’S NEW
Throw 2.0: We’ve been lucky to bowl with hundreds of players since launch, this update is directly based on the feedback from our awesome community!
Smooth Locomotion & Turning: Players can now change from snap turn to smooth turn and teleportation to smooth locomotion independently, to suit their preferences. This is a two hand control scheme, with right/left hand flip for thumb sticks.
The Jukebox: Pick your playlist, powered by YouTube to listen to the songs you want to hear while rolling. Use your trigger to interact with 8 curated playlists or search through the endless supply of videos or music to curate your experience.
More XP, More Coins per Game: Players now earn more coins and XP in each alley! Earn 2x XP and at least 100 coins for each game you roll. 
Create Match Button: Easing the difficulty of connecting in multiplayer, we have replaced Public Matches’ Quick Match button, to a fancy Create Match Button. Players now have the option to create a new Multiplayer public room or join an existing one. Lists are grouped by server region.
Control Multiplayer Visibility: Control your party with your pointer by easily muting and vanishing multiplayer members.
See Avatars Talk: Your avatar’s mouth moves when you talk in multiplayer! Whoa.
Fist Bumps & High Fives: Give some next-level props with first bumps and high fives in multiplayer. Low five or side fives are fair game. 
Clapping: Give respectful kudos when it’s due with a cordial clap.

IMPROVEMENTS
Calm Arms: Players can now set down their inactive controller without causing in-game avatar distortion.
Gutter Avoider Effect Visualization: Watch the lane brighten when a gutter avoider is used to help better gauge your release.
Premium Ball Effects: Beautiful animations have been added to most of the premium balls. Shake the fish tank to see water drop. Roll the alien head to hear him talk. Watch the dragon soar majestically above your ball. 
Updated UI Screen: We’ve improved the look of the results screen and a few other popups & widgets throughout the experience
Ball Rack Numbering: The racks are now numbered in the store to make it easier to find the ball you’re looking for.
Bugs: We’ve stomped on a ton of bugs and then some

KNOWN ISSUES
Multiplayer Stability: There are various multiplayer issues while playing multiplayer. If you get disconnected or the game acts funny while rolling, restart the match or try reconnecting. 
Avatar Animations: Some players are experiencing choppy avatar animations. We’re looking into it!

nodes.title: What's New: June Feature Update (1.1.235)
nodes.body_text:
WHAT'S NEW
Throw 2.0: We've been lucky to bowl with hundreds of players since launch, this update is directly based on the feedback from our awesome community!
Smooth Locomotion & Turning : Players can now change from snap turn to smooth turn and teleportation to smooth locomotion independently, to suit their preferences. This is a two hand control scheme, with right/left hand flip for thumb sticks.
The Jukebox : Pick your playlist, powered by YouTube to listen to the songs you want to hear while rolling. Use your trigger to interact with 8 curated playlists or search through the endless supply of videos or music to curate your experience.
More XP, More Coins per Game : Players now earn more coins and XP in each alley! Earn 2x XP and at least 100 coins for each game you roll.
Create Match Button : Easing the difficulty of connecting in multiplayer, we have replaced Public Matches' Quick Match button, to a fancy Create Match Button. Players now have the option to create a new Multiplayer public room or join an existing one. Lists are grouped by server region.
Control Multiplayer Visibility : Control your party with your pointer by easily muting and vanishing multiplayer members.
See Avatars Talk: Your avatar's mouth moves when you talk in multiplayer! Whoa.
Fist Bumps & High Fives : Give some next-level props with first bumps and high fives in multiplayer. Low five or side fives are fair game.
Clapping : Give respectful kudos when it's due with a cordial clap.

IMPROVEMENTS
Calm Arms : Players can now set down their inactive controller without causing in-game avatar distortion.
Gutter Avoider Effect Visualization : Watch the lane brighten when a gutter avoider is used to help better gauge your release.
Premium Ball Effects : Beautiful animations have been added to most of the premium balls. Shake the fish tank to see water drop. Roll the alien head to hear him talk. Watch the dragon soar majestically above your ball.
Updated UI Screen : We've improved the look of the results screen and a few other popups & widgets throughout the experience
Ball Rack Numbering : The racks are now numbered in the store to make it easier to find the ball you're looking for.
Bugs : We've stomped on a ton of bugs and then some

KNOWN ISSUES
Multiplayer Stability : There are various multiplayer issues while playing multiplayer. If you get disconnected or the game acts funny while rolling, restart the match or try reconnecting.
Avatar Animations : Some players are experiencing choppy avatar animations. We're looking into it!

SUPPORT
We want to hear from you! Email us at support@forevrgames.com for anything and everything that is happening with your game.

Join the Forever Bowl Players Association on Discord for tips & tricks, how-tos, and the latest news.

node.reviewDescription:
Video Review: https://youtu.be/POS9hQk3hrw
*Was given review copy for this review from developers.

 I have been playing ForeVR Bowl for about a week now and the biggest thing I love about it is the enormous attention to detail they have put into the game in every area. I'm talking about 100 bowling balls with different weight and speed, and while some are admittedly unrealistic, most of these are setup exactly like real bowling balls where slight differences in the design change the physics of the ball. They also went above and beyond offering unique soundtracks for each of the 6 lanes with a lot of good music including some licenced stuff. 

 So handling wise it's Wii Sports from my perspective, you can twist your wrist and give it some spin in the same way your just adding in the whole roomscale aspect of VR to the equation so in that regard I recommend giving yourself some space (though I've seen some play it seated so that could be an option for some in the right seat). But it all feels really good and I have been told from the devs that they had pro bowlers test this to ensure it felt realistic. There are special balls like gutter avoider which curves when it gets near a gutter, and stuff like the power shot that is almost like throwing a bullet but there is tons of stuff that look cool and might make some sounds but they are traditional bowling balls in how they perform on the lane. The game currently is teleport and snap turning only (you can change how much your snap turning in options) but they have assured us the first update will include smooth locomotion options.

 Multiplayer wise it supports 4 players online and 8 players locally with pass and play and if your using a game sharing thing with a family member this game supports that as well so you only need to buy one copy. There is a weekly leaderboard for each level and a local leaderboard but the scores will not intersect so if you get a 300 in weekly ranked its not going to show on local and vice versa. 

  To conclude I found this a fantastic Bowling VR game and had a great time playing it by myself and with friends. I highly recommend purchasing it if your into bowling or if your looking for the perfect game to play with a group of friends.
node.reviewTitle: It's Wii Sports Bowling VR basically :)
